header.title: make great websites. Websites make your business
header.paragraph: I build websites that helps you having the best online experience, retain more traffic and grow your business.

project.titleHelper: Multiple brands have put their trust in my work. I also create projects on my own to perfect my skills.
project.projectDescription: LAVPCVE is a brand that works building gaming computers for all Venezuela. They are the very best company with a "PC Builder" on the web. This project was made in React with NextJS, using Tailwind for the styles.

phrase.content: Every project is different and requires precise attention to the brand identity and goals.

values.title: Fully reviewed
values.content: I review intensively in every stage of the process to have the websites in top-notch conditions.

values.title: Beautiful design
values.content: I design clear designs that speaks for itself and let customers focus on the important.

values.title: Thoroughly testing
values.content: I test the website to ensure all functions work perfectly.

values.title: Continuous support
values.content: I help you with new features or improvements as your website grows.

me.title: Juan Alvarez
me.content: I build websites for companies and people who wants to have an amazing experience on the internet. I have a couple years of programming and making websites, but I've focusing in this field for a 1 year (and little more).

skills.title: Basics
skills.content: I learnt and work all days with the basics of web development.

skills.title: Framworks
skills.content: To keep my expertise up-to-date, I use some frameworks to back me up.

skills.title: Backend
skills.content: I also know how to implement a backend. Full stack FTW!

skills.title: Other hobbies
skills.content: In my free time, I not only code.
